name: Tale of Under-Earth: a Cave Bound Story
name_original: Tale of Under-Earth: a Cave Bound Story
description:
Input. Arrow keys to move. 'Z' Key to fire shot that stuns enemies. Move over enemies to destroy them while they are stunned.

Gameplay. Drill through earth an enemies to increase your score, but watch your heat levels: if you overheat, you will start taking engine damage. When your engine damage gets to 8, you lose. Also, move upward and away from the encroaching lava.

Note. MacOS bundle forthcoming.
